hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
echo $LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR export VCTOOLS_PACKAGE=`find /mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins_Harvester/Linux -maxdepth 1 -name *.tgz` export BOOST_DIR="/mnt/nfs/TOOLS/boost-1.53.0" export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=27000@192.168.163.60
if [ -f $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE ];then echo $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE tar -zxvf $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE cd release ./install.sh cd .. else echo "VcTools package not available in $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE" exit 1 fi
#function to handle error handle_error() { export _error_=$? if [ ! "$_error_" == "0" ];then echo " Command failed " export _RETURN_CODE_=$_error_ fi }
#Set up Environment varaibles export VECTORCAST_DIR=${LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR} export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH
#Print tools version in console for reference $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
cd $WORKSPACE mkdir lua cd lua tar -zxvf /home/vectorindia/Performance_Regression/apps/lua/lua-5.3.1.tar.gz cp -r /home/vectorindia/Performance_Regression/scripts/* . cp /home/vectorindia/Performance_Regression/apps/lua/perfcommands .
#generating CCAST_.CFG $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc template GNU_C_44
python perfmodule.py
